function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Optimization model prioritizes energy consumption over disease spread","Impact":"Risk of increased spread of COVID-19 due to minimized focus on infection control","Mitigation":"Increase emphasis on infection control measures alongside energy optimization","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems with air filtration and circulation control","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of consideration for infection control in the optimization model","Impact":"Potential for accelerated transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Incorporate infection control measures in the optimization model","Technologies":"Sensor-based occupancy monitoring, air quality sensors","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building owners, architects, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation in thermal zones","Impact":"Risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases within the built environment","Mitigation":"Implementation of improved ventilation systems and air circulation strategies","Technologies":"HVAC systems with high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, air purifiers","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, architects"}]}
